name: life
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the period between birth and death, or the experience or state of being alive
trans_examp.trans_cn: 寿命；生命；一生，人生；生活；性命

example.eg: Life's too short to worry about money!
example.egtrans: 人生短暂，何必为金钱而烦恼！

example.eg: I'm not sure I want to spend the rest of my life with him.
example.egtrans: 我不能肯定自己是否愿意与他共度余生。

example.eg: Unfortunately, accidents are part of life.
example.egtrans: 不幸的是，意外事故也是生活的一部分。

example.eg: He went mad towards the end of his life.
example.egtrans: 他在生命走向终了时疯掉了。

example.eg: Cats are supposed to have nine lives.
example.egtrans: 据说猫有九命。

example.eg: He doesn't know what he really wants in/out of life.
example.egtrans: 他不知道自己在生活中真正想要的是什么。

example.eg: The accident changed my whole outlook on life.
example.egtrans: 那场事故彻底改变了我对人生的看法。

example.eg: He lost his life (= died suddenly because of a violent event or accident) in the Great War.
example.egtrans: 他在一战中丧生。

example.eg: A simple mixture of glucose and water can save lives in many parts of the world.
example.egtrans: 在世界上很多地方，把葡萄糖和水混合在一起就可以用来拯救人的性命。

example.eg: He ran off with her life savings (= all the money she had saved).
example.egtrans: 他带着她毕生的积蓄跑掉了。

trans_examp.trans_en: a way of living or a particular part of someone's life
trans_examp.trans_cn: 生活方式；生活（的某一部分）

example.eg: her family/private/sex life
example.egtrans: 她的家庭／个人／性生活

example.eg: my working life
example.egtrans: 我的职业生涯

example.eg: We interviewed senior politicians, famous writers, and others in public life.
example.egtrans: 我们采访了资深政界人士、著名作家等公众人物。

example.eg: Drugs and violence are deeply rooted in American life.
example.egtrans: 毒品和暴力在美国社会生活中已经根深蒂固。

example.eg: I left home at 16 to see life (= have different experiences with a lot of people in lots of places).
example.egtrans: 我16岁离家出去闯荡世界。

example.eg: Teaching has been her life (= the most important and enjoyable thing in her life).
example.egtrans: 教书已成为了她的生命。

trans_examp.trans_en: the period for which a machine or organization lasts

example.eg: The newer batteries have a much longer life.
example.egtrans: 新一代电池的寿命要长得多。

example.eg: Careful use will prolong the life of your machine.
example.egtrans: 小心使用会延长机器的寿命。

example.eg: The legislation won't be passed during the life of the present parliament.
example.egtrans: 该项立法在当前议会的任期内不会获得通过。

trans_examp.trans_en: the quality that makes people, animals, and plants different from objects, substances, and things that are dead

example.eg: The doctor could find no sign of life in the old man's body.
example.egtrans: 医生发现老人已经没有了生命迹象。

example.eg: I looked through the window but I couldn't see any signs of life (= people moving).
example.egtrans: 我透过窗子向外望去，却看不到有任何人类活动的迹象。

example.eg: She's so full of life.
example.egtrans: 她充满了活力。

example.eg: human/marine/plant life
example.egtrans: 人类／海洋生物／植物

trans_examp.trans_en: In art, if you work from life, you paint, draw, etc. real people or objects, usually while they are in front of you rather than from memory.

example.eg: life drawing classes
example.egtrans: 写生课

trans_examp.trans_en: especially in children's games, one of the limited number of times that you can lose, but still continue playing
trans_examp.trans_cn: （尤指儿童游戏中的）一次机会；命

example.eg: Every time the little man gets hit, you lose a life.
example.egtrans: 小人儿每被击中一次，你就丢了一条命。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to make something more real or exciting

example.eg: It's always been an interesting period in history and this film really brought it to life.
example.egtrans: 这段历史总是令人饶有兴味，这部电影对此进行了真实的再现。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to become more real or exciting
dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: 使更加实在；使更有生机

example.eg: The game really came to life in the second half.
example.egtrans: 比赛下半场有了生机。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: for the whole of a person's life

example.eg: I believe marriage is for life.
example.egtrans: 我相信婚姻是一辈子的事情。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to be willing to die in order to defend or support someone or something

example.eg: They were ready to give their lives for their country.
example.egtrans: 他们已做好了为国捐躯的准备。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: If you believe in life after death, you believe that people continue to exist in some form after they die.
to completely change how or where you live

example.eg: She decided to start a new life in Australia.
example.egtrans: 她决定在澳大利亚开始新的生活。
